author: Reuters Editorial
title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St advances as Fed seen taking moderate approach to inflation
text:
NEW YORK, May 23 (Reuters) - U.S. stocks ended with small gains on Wednesday after minutes from the Federal Reserveâ€™s latest meeting suggested higher inflation may not result in faster interest rate hikes.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 52.4 points, or 0.21 percent, to 24,886.81, the S&P 500 gained 8.85 points, or 0.32 percent, to 2,733.29 and the Nasdaq Composite added 47.50 points, or 0.64 percent, to 7,425.96. (Reporting by Caroline Valetkevitch Editing by Chizu Nomiyama)
